replies.body:
I speak English and Indian c:
jkjk, for reading/understanding: English, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, Sanskrit, little Telugu, little Brahui (I think that's how it's spelled), mexican/central american and south american Spanish, bits of portuguese, galician,  and Italian, some French, i know a few dutch words, a little German, a little yiddish/hebrew, a bit of syriac, a bit of arabic, can read classical Greek (learning a bit of conversational), some Occitan, little Catalan words, little neapolitan and sicilian, decent russian, maybe ukrainian/belarussian, gangsta, canadian, 
speaking: English, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, little Telugu and Brahui, Spanish, maybe Russian (haven't spoken in a while) and gangsta is what I'm confident in speaking. I can maybe pass a conversation in the others, idk, never tried.

speaking: English, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, little Telugu and Brahui, Spanish, maybe Russian (haven't spoken in a while) and gangsta is what I'm confident in speaking. I can maybe pass a conversation in the others, idk, never tried.
